text: Allaha tomadera santana sambandhe nirdesa dicchena [1]: Eka putrera [2] ansa du'i kan'yara ansera samana; kintu sudhu kan'ya du'iyera besi thakale tadera jan'ya parityakta sampattira tina bhagera duâ€™bhaga, ara matra eka kan'ya thakale tara jan'ya ardheka [3]. Tara santana thakale tara pita-mata pratyekera jan'ya parityakta sampattira chaya bhagera eka bhaga; se nihsantana hale ebam pita-mata'i uttaradhikari hale tara matara jan'ya tina bhagera eka bhaga; tara bha'i-bona thakale matara jan'ya chaya bhagera eka bhaga [4]; e saba'i se ya osiyata kare ta deyara ebam rna parisodhera para [5]. Tomadera pita o santanadera madhye upakare ke tomadera nikatatara ta tomara jana na [6]. E bidhana allahara; niscaya allaha sarbajna, prajnamaya
